verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It passeth knowledge, that dear love of Thine, My Savior, Jesus; yet this soul of mine Would of Thy love in all its breadth and length, Its height and depth, its everlasting strength, Know more and more.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It passeth telling, that dear love of Thine, My Savior, Jesus; yet these lips of mine Would fain proclaim to sinners, far and near, A love which can remove all guilty fear, And love beget.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It passeth praises, that dear love of Thine, My Savior, Jesus; yet this heart of mine Would sing that love, so full, so rich, so free, Which brings a rebel sinner, such as me, Nigh unto God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
v6
v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord Jesus, when Thee face to face I see, When on Thy lofty throne I sit with Thee, Then of Thy love, in all its breadth and length, Its height and depth, its everlasting strength, My soul shall sing.{/lang-eng}
